refnamediv.refpurpose: add a dir to a path environment variable then chain

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: prependpath is a chain-loading utility that prepends the value dir to the path environment variable var, and then chain loads to next-prog with the execvp3 function. If the environment variable is set and not empty, it inserts a colon (:) between the prepended dir and the old value of var.
next-prog may contain its own command line options, which prependpath will ignore.

refsection.title: BUGS
refsection.para: Although not strictly a bug in this program, it is worth noting that the GNU C library and the BSD library both have memory leaks in their setenv3 functions, used by this program. You can work around these bugs by ensuring that next-prog is not a built-in command (see exec1).
